import React, { useState}from 'react' function Slogin () { const [user, setUser]=useState({ username:"", password:"" }) const {username, password}=user const loginChange=(e)=>setUser({...user, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) return (

LOGIN PAGE

Sign In

loginChange(e)} placeholder="username..." name="username" value={username}/>
loginChange(e)} placeholder="username..." name="password" value={password}/>
) } export default Slogin
